targets.queryText:
SELECT sensor_readings.humidity AS bedroom, sensor_readings.tstamp AS time FROM sensors 
JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.id_sensor=sensor_readings.id_sensor WHERE sensors.location='bedroom' ORDER BY tstamp ASC;
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT sensor_readings.humidity AS bedroom, sensor_readings.tstamp AS time FROM sensors 
JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.id_sensor=sensor_readings.id_sensor WHERE sensors.location='bedroom' ORDER BY tstamp ASC;

targets.queryText: SELECT sensor_readings.temperature AS bedroom, sensor_readings.tstamp AS time FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.id_sensor=sensor_readings.id_sensor WHERE sensors.location='bedroom' ORDER BY tstamp ASC;

targets.queryText:
SELECT sensor_readings.battery AS Bedroom
FROM sensor_readings JOIN sensors ON sensor_readings.id_sensor=sensors.id_sensor 
WHERE sensors.location='bedroom'
ORDER BY sensor_readings.tstamp DESC
LIMIT 1
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT sensor_readings.battery AS Bedroom
FROM sensor_readings JOIN sensors ON sensor_readings.id_sensor=sensors.id_sensor 
WHERE sensors.location='bedroom'
ORDER BY sensor_readings.tstamp DESC
LIMIT 1

targets.queryText:
SELECT ' -- ' || sensors.location || ' -- '  || sensor_errors.error_message AS value, 
CASE severity 
  WHEN 50 THEN 'warning'
  WHEN 60 THEN 'error'
  WHEN 100 THEN 'critical'
  ELSE 'info'
END AS level, sensor_errors.tstamp AS time
FROM sensor_errors JOIN sensors ON sensor_errors.id_sensor=sensors.id_sensor
ORDER BY sensor_errors.tstamp DESC
LIMIT 10
targets.rawQueryText:
SELECT ' -- ' || sensors.location || ' -- '  || sensor_errors.error_message AS value, 
CASE severity 
  WHEN 50 THEN 'warning'
  WHEN 60 THEN 'error'
  WHEN 100 THEN 'critical'
  ELSE 'info'
END AS level, sensor_errors.tstamp AS time
FROM sensor_errors JOIN sensors ON sensor_errors.id_sensor=sensors.id_sensor
ORDER BY sensor_errors.tstamp DESC
LIMIT 10
